name: Final Project Rough Draft
description:
If you do not have Knytt, download the zip. Open the Knytt Stories application. Extract all if prompted. When open, click 'Play' and then click the title "First Attempt (Brandon Shafer)". Next click Slot 1 - New game and the game should begin.  

If you already have Knytt, just drag the .bin attached into the install level button. Select new game and begin. 

Alt + Enter Makes Game Go Full-screen
